Text:
If you travel back decades into history you find out that as taxes on the rich rise, the less vocal are they. What do you think would be a good rate to shut 'em up completely? I'd start at 300% and go up.

AVIGUY

I have no problem with them lowering capital gains tax rates as much as they want.

It just has to be one percent higher than payroll + income tax.

AVIGUY
